description: A new agreement must be reached or regulation will be imposed on Manx Gas, says Chris Thomas.
title: Manx Gas must agree new profits deal by 24 April, says minister
title_page: Manx Gas must agree new profits deal by 24 April, says minister - BBC News
maintext: Manx Gas must agree a new regulatory deal with the government by 24 April or face having regulation "imposed" on it, the policy and reform minister said.
